short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-powered service to 10x enhance your networking building.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AISMA is an AI-powered service that enhances your network building on ğ•/LinkedIn by 10 times. It facilitates the discovery of profiles you're interested in, track them and allows you to send them pre-generated direct messages.

The tool also helps you by providing AI-generated replies. This is especially useful when you need, for example, to quickly and diversely respond to support or gratitude comments. All you need to do is provide a prompt.

The tool is simple to use on ğ•:

1. Enter the keywords on the Dashboard.
2. Browse ğ• as usual. The extension will highlight relevant profiles.
3. Click the Scan button on the highlighted profiles.
4. The tool automatically checks if they match your settings and adds matched profiles to the contacts collection.
5. Click on profile links. The tool opens the DM page and generates a message based on a template that you can modify.
6. The generated message is added to the clipboard, and all you need to do is press "CTRL + v" (Windows) or "âŒ˜ + v" (iOS) to insert it into the message box.
7. Click Send, and you're done!

Now you can save hours contacting new people and grow your network 10 times faster!

The most useful strategy to find profiles is to visit a user's Followers tab, e.g., https://twitter.com/alexey_anshakov/followers.

Main benefits and features of AISMA:

- Find relevant profiles quickly and easily during regular ğ• browsing.
- Scan followers' lists of others in no time.
- Build a profile collection.
- Quickly and efficiently send direct messages to new contacts.
- AI-generated post replies. Both for ğ• and LinkedIn.

Install now and expand your network to find new friends!

Note: The extension is currently in the alpha stage.
